verbs.description: asian [V: shredded] [ARG1: pork sandwiches] on cool - weather weeknights the slow cooker is our friend the plums might surprise in these juicy pork sandwiches but they add a little sweetness and make the meat extra tender —holly battiste barrington new jersey cook
